=================
 Looking Forward
=================

** (Not ordered by importance) **

Implementations:
- ARMA
- ARIMA
- Multiple Imputation
- EM with Kalman Filter

Datasets:
- Load more real world datasets
- Generate MCAR, MAR and MNAR data

Feature Upgrades:
- `compare`: Allow customization of used ML algorithms

Major Updates:
- Imputation of n-dimensional data
- Imputation on specific formats (text, image, audio)
